mil1:9.2: nihatapaccatthikaṃ → nihatapaccatthika (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | nīhata (maku) | nippaccatthikaṃ (mr), varapavaragopuratoraṇaṃ → pavarapacuragopuratoraṇaṃ (bj)
mil1:9.3: vividhadānaggasatasamupasobhitaṃ → satatamupasobhitaṃ (mr), vividhasamaṇabrāhmaṇasabhājanasaṅghaṭitaṃ → ... sammābhājana ... (mr) | ... samabhājana ... (csp1ed), bahuvidhavijjāvanta → ... vijjādhara (mr), naraciranisevitaṃ → naravīra ... (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
